name: 5th International Conference on Advanced Materials Research and Manufacturing Technologies
content: 5th International Conference on Advanced Materials Research and Manufacturing Technologies (AMRMT 2020) is organized by and Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers, technically sponsored by South China University of Technology and Swinburne University of Technology. The conference will be hosted in Shenyang, China during Aug. 13-15, 2020! We warmly welcome prospected authors submit your new research papers to AMRMT 2020, and share your valuable experiences with all of attaendees.
organizers: Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers
